[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mA heap-buffer-overflow vulnerability has been detected in the Wireshark IRC [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mprotocol dissector [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`packet-irc.c`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. The issue occurs during the parsing of IRC [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mNAMES commands when the dissector attempts to write [0m[1;36m132[0m[39m bytes beyond the allocated [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer boundary. This vulnerability was discovered through fuzzing with [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAddressSanitizer enabled, resulting in a write operation that exceeds a [0m[1;36m51[0m[39m-byte [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mallocated region by [0m[1;36m132[0m[39m bytes.[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Vulnerability Type[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThis is a **heap-buffer-overflow** vulnerability with a SCARINESS score of [0m[1;36m45[0m[39m, [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mclassified as a multi-byte-write-heap-buffer-overflow. The vulnerability allows [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwriting data beyond the bounds of an allocated heap buffer, which can lead to [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmemory corruption and potentially arbitrary code execution.[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Technical Details[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe vulnerability manifests in the following call chain:[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. `[0m[1;35mdissect_irc[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` in `packet-irc.[0m[1;92mc:1114[0m[39m`[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. `[0m[1;35mdissect_irc_request[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` in `packet-irc.[0m[1;92mc:811[0m[39m`[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. `[0m[1;35mdissect_irc_request_command[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` in `packet-irc.[0m[1;92mc:702[0m[39m`[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. `[0m[1;35mdissect_irc_names[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` in `packet-irc.[0m[1;92mc:563[0m[39m`[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. `[0m[1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` in `tvbuff.[0m[1;92mc:945[0m[39m`[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. `[0m[1;35mmemcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` leading to the overflow[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe issue occurs when:[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- A [0m[1;36m51[0m[39m-byte region is allocated at address `[0m[1;36m0x5060001c64c0[0m[39m` in [0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35mdissect_irc_names[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` at line [0m[1;36m537[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- A subsequent `memcpy` operation attempts to write [0m[1;36m132[0m[39m bytes starting at address [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;36m0x5060001c64f3[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mwhich is [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m bytes after the end of the allocated region[0m[1;39m)[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- This results in writing [0m[1;36m132[0m[39m bytes beyond the buffer boundary[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Test Case Analysis[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe fuzzer input that triggered the vulnerability consists of:[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mNAMES [0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m#aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39maaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa,#hello\n[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThis input represents an IRC NAMES command with:[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- A channel name prefixed with `#` followed by [0m[1;36m125[0m[39m [0m[32m'a'[0m[39m characters[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- A comma separator[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Another channel name `#hello`[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- A newline character[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe pattern suggests the vulnerability is triggered when processing a NAMES command[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwith an unusually long channel name followed by additional channel names.[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Areas for Investigation[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mTo understand the full scope of this vulnerability, the following code sections [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mshould be examined:[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **`epan/dissectors/packet-irc.c`**:[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Line [0m[1;36m537[0m[39m: The allocation logic in `[0m[1;35mdissect_irc_names[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` where the [0m[1;36m51[0m[39m-byte [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer is allocated[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Line [0m[1;36m563[0m[39m: The `[0m[1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` call that triggers the overflow[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Lines [0m[1;36m702[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m811[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m1114[0m[39m: The call chain leading to the vulnerable function[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The entire `[0m[1;35mdissect_irc_names[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` function to understand how it calculates [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer sizes and processes channel names[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **`epan/tvbuff.c`**:[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Line [0m[1;36m945[0m[39m: The `[0m[1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` implementation to understand how it performs the [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmemory copy operation[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Related buffer handling functions in the tvbuff API[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Buffer Size Calculation Logic**:[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - How the size of [0m[1;36m51[0m[39m bytes was determined for the initial allocation[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - How the size of [0m[1;36m132[0m[39m bytes for the copy operation was calculated[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Whether there are any bounds checking mechanisms that failed to catch this [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moverflow[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **IRC Protocol Dissector Structure**:[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - How the dissector parses IRC commands[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - How it handles multiple channel names in NAMES commands[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Any assumptions made about maximum channel name lengths or command lengths[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe vulnerability appears to stem from a mismatch between the allocated buffer size[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[1;36m51[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and the amount of data being copied [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m132[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, suggesting either [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mincorrect size calculation during allocation or insufficient validation before the [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcopy operation.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHere is the initial issue log of the codebase:[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<issue>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[33mFUZZER[0m[39m=[0m[35mhandler_irc[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ shift[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[32m'[0m[32m[[0m[32m'[0m[39m [0m[32m'!'[0m[39m -v TESTCASE [0m[32m'[0m[32m][0m[32m'[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[33mTESTCASE[0m[39m=[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[32m'[0m[32m[[0m[32m'[0m[39m [0m[32m'!'[0m[39m -f [0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m [0m[32m'[0m[32m][0m[32m'[0m                                                          [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ export [0m[33mSKIP_SEED_CORPUS[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m1[0m                                                         [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/out/[0m[95mhandler_irc[0m[39m: Running [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m inputs [0m[1;36m100[0m[39m [0m[1;35mtime[0m[1;39m([0m[39ms[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m each.[0m                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/src/wireshark/epan/[0m[95mpacket.c[0m[39m:[0m[1;92m887:9[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    #[0m[1;36m8[0m[39m [0m[1;36m0x5b8733d[0m[39m in call_dissector_work [0m[35m/src/wireshark/epan/[0m[95mpacket.c[0m[39m:[0m[1;92m975:9[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    #[0m[1;36m9[0m[39m [0m[1;36m0x5b91f94[0m[39m in call_dissector_only [0m[35m/src/wireshark/epan/[0m[95mpacket.c[0m[39m:[0m[1;92m3621:8[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    #[0m[1;36m10[0m[39m [0m[1;36m0x5b91f94[0m[39m in call_all_postdissectors [0m[35m/src/wireshark/epan/[0m[95mpacket.c[0m[39m:[0m[1;92m4166:3[0m    [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m356[0m[39m:         end_offset = [0m[1;35mtvb_find_uint8[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_offset, length, [0m[32m','[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m           [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m932[0m[39m:    [0m[39m * of the tvbuff'" convention, and use other means to achieve[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m933[0m[39m:    [0m[39m * that; this would let us eliminate a bunch of checks for[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m934[0m[39m:    [0m[39m * negative lengths in cases where the protocol has a [0m[1;36m32[0m[39m-bit[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m935[0m[39m:    [0m[39m * length field.[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m936[0m[39m:    [0m[39m *[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m937[0m[39m:    [0m[39m * Allowing [0m[1;36m-1[0m[39m but throwing an assertion on other negative[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m938[0m[39m:    [0m[39m * lengths is a bit more work with the length being a size_t;[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m939[0m[39m:    [0m[39m * instead, we check for a length <= [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m^[0m[1;36m31[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m1[0m[39m.[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m940[0m[39m:    [0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m941[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mDISSECTOR_ASSERT[0m[1;39m([0m[39mlength <= [0m[1;36m0x7FFFFFFF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m942[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mcheck_offset_length[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, offset, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m length, &abs_offset, &abs_length[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m943[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m944[0m[39m:    [0m[39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtarget && tvb->real_data[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m945[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39mreturn [0m[1;35mmemcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtarget, tvb->real_data + abs_offset, abs_length[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m946[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m947[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m949[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39mreturn tvb->ops->[0m[1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, target, abs_offset, abs_length[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m950[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m953[0m[39m:    [0m[39m * [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb->real_data could be null if it's allocated with[0m                     [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m935[0m[39m:    [0m[39m * length field.[0m                                                            [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m939[0m[39m:    [0m[39m * instead, we check for a length <= [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m^[0m[1;36m31[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m1[0m[39m.[0m                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m942[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mcheck_offset_length[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, offset, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m length, &abs_offset, &abs_length[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m943[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m950[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m952[0m[39m:    [0m[39m * If the length is [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, there's nothing to do.[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m953[0m[39m:    [0m[39m * [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb->real_data could be null if it's allocated with[0m                     [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m586[0m[39m:     channel_name = [0m[1;35mmalloc[0m[1;39m([0m[39mCHANNELLEN+[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m587[0m[39m: [0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m588[0m[39m:     if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name == NULL [0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m589[0m[39m:         return;[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m590[0m[39m:     [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m591[0m[39m: [0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m592[0m[39m:     start_offset = offset;[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m593[0m[39m: [0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m594[0m[39m:     tree = [0m[1;35mproto_item_add_subtree[0m[1;39m([0m[39mitem, ett_irc_request_command_list[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m595[0m[39m: [0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m596[0m[39m:     [0m[1;35mwhile[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mtvb_offset_exists[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_offset[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m597[0m[39m:         length = [0m[1;35mtvb_captured_length_remaining[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_offset[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m598[0m[39m:         end_offset = [0m[1;35mtvb_find_uint8[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_offset, length, [0m[32m','[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m599[0m[39m: [0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m600[0m[39m:         if [0m[1;39m([0m[39m end_offset == [0m[1;36m-1[0m[39m [0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m601[0m[39m:             [0m[1;35mproto_tree_add_item[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, hf_irc_request_command_list_channel, [0m    [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m602[0m[39m:             [0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m603[0m[39m:             [0m[1;35mmemset[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name, [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, CHANNELLEN+[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m604[0m[39m:             [0m[1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, channel_name, start_offset, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlength < CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m? length : CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m612[0m[39m:         [0m[1;35mmemset[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name, [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, CHANNELLEN+[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                 [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39mCHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ? end_offset-start_offset : CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m614[0m[39m:         [0m[1;35mproto_item_append_text[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, [0m[32m"Channel: %s"[0m[39m, channel_name[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m             [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstart_offset, end_offset-start_offset, ENC_ASCII[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m618[0m[39m:     [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m931[0m[39m:    [0m[39m * XXX - we should eliminate the "length = [0m[1;36m-1[0m[39m means 'to the end[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m932[0m[39m:    [0m[39m * of the tvbuff'" convention, and use other means to achieve[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m933[0m[39m:    [0m[39m * that; this would let us eliminate a bunch of checks for[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m934[0m[39m:    [0m[39m * negative lengths in cases where the protocol has a [0m[1;36m32[0m[39m-bit[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m935[0m[39m:    [0m[39m * length field.[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m936[0m[39m:    [0m[39m *[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m937[0m[39m:    [0m[39m * Allowing [0m[1;36m-1[0m[39m but throwing an assertion on other negative[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m938[0m[39m:    [0m[39m * lengths is a bit more work with the length being a size_t;[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m939[0m[39m:    [0m[39m * instead, we check for a length <= [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m^[0m[1;36m31[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m1[0m[39m.[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m940[0m[39m:    [0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m941[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mDISSECTOR_ASSERT[0m[1;39m([0m[39mlength <= [0m[1;36m0x7FFFFFFF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m942[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mcheck_offset_length[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, offset, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m length, &abs_offset, &abs_length[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m943[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m944[0m[39m:    [0m[39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtarget && tvb->real_data[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m945[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39mreturn [0m[1;35mmemcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtarget, tvb->real_data + abs_offset, abs_length[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m946[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m947[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m949[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39mreturn tvb->ops->[0m[1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, target, abs_offset, abs_length[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m950[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m951[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[39m*[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m952[0m[39m:    [0m[39m * If the length is [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, there's nothing to do.[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m953[0m[39m:    [0m[39m * [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb->real_data could be null if it's allocated with[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m954[0m[39m:    [0m[39m * a size of length.[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m955[0m[39m:    [0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m956[0m[39m:    [0m[39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlength != [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m957[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[35m/[0m[39m*[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m958[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m * XXX, fallback to slower method[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m959[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m960[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[1;35mDISSECTOR_ASSERT_NOT_REACHED[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                     [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2464[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2465[0m[39m:   [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Only search to end of tvbuff, w/o throwing exception. *[0m[35m/[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2466[0m[39m:   [0m[39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[39mmaxlength >= [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m && limit > [0m[1;39m([0m[39munsigned[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m maxlength[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2467[0m[39m:   [0m[39m        [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Maximum length doesn't go past end of tvbuff; search[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2468[0m[39m:   [0m[39m        [0m[39m   to that value. *[0m[35m/[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2469[0m[39m:   [0m[39m        [0m[39mlimit = [0m[1;39m([0m[39munsigned[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m maxlength;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2470[0m[39m:   [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2471[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2472[0m[39m:   [0m[35m/[0m[39m* If we have real data, perform our search now. *[0m[35m/[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2473[0m[39m:   [0m[39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb->real_data[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2474[0m[39m:   [0m[39m        [0m[39mresult = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mconst uint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35mmemchr[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb->real_data + abs_offset, [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mneedle, limit[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2475[0m[39m:   [0m[39m        [0m[39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[39mresult == NULL[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2476[0m[39m:   [0m[39m        [0m[39m        [0m[39mreturn [0m[1;36m-1[0m[39m;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2477[0m[39m:   [0m[39m        [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2478[0m[39m:   [0m[39m        [0m[39melse [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2479[0m[39m:   [0m[39m        [0m[39m        [0m[39mreturn [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mresult - tvb->real_data[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2480[0m[39m:   [0m[39m        [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2481[0m[39m:   [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2482[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m929[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m930[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[39m*[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m931[0m[39m:    [0m[39m * XXX - we should eliminate the "length = [0m[1;36m-1[0m[39m means 'to the end[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m932[0m[39m:    [0m[39m * of the tvbuff'" convention, and use other means to achieve[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m933[0m[39m:    [0m[39m * that; this would let us eliminate a bunch of checks for[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m934[0m[39m:    [0m[39m * negative lengths in cases where the protocol has a [0m[1;36m32[0m[39m-bit[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m935[0m[39m:    [0m[39m * length field.[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m936[0m[39m:    [0m[39m *[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m937[0m[39m:    [0m[39m * Allowing [0m[1;36m-1[0m[39m but throwing an assertion on other negative[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m938[0m[39m:    [0m[39m * lengths is a bit more work with the length being a size_t;[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m939[0m[39m:    [0m[39m * instead, we check for a length <= [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m^[0m[1;36m31[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m1[0m[39m.[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m940[0m[39m:    [0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m941[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mDISSECTOR_ASSERT[0m[1;39m([0m[39mlength <= [0m[1;36m0x7FFFFFFF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m942[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mcheck_offset_length[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, offset, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m length, &abs_offset, &abs_length[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m943[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
