[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtag_start_offset+[0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, end_offset-tag_start_offset-[0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, &pbrk_tag_delimiter, [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m&found_tag_needle[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m896[0m[39m:             if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtag_end_offset == [0m[1;36m-1[0m[1;39m)[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m897[0m[39m:             [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m898[0m[39m:                 [0m[1;35mexpert_add_info[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpinfo, request_item, [0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m&ei_irc_missing_end_delimiter[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m899[0m[39m:                 return;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m900[0m[39m:             [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m901[0m[39m: [0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m902[0m[39m:             [0m[1;35mdissect_irc_tag_data[0m[1;39m([0m[39mrequest_tree, request_item, tvb, [0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtag_start_offset, tag_end_offset-tag_start_offset, pinfo, str_command[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m903[0m[39m:             offset = tag_end_offset+[0m[1;36m1[0m[39m;[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m904[0m[39m:         [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m905[0m[39m:     [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m906[0m[39m: [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mepan/dissectors/packet-irc.[0m[1;92mc:1073[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m1124[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1073[0m[39m: static int[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1074[0m[39m: [0m[1;35mdissect_irc[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvbuff_t *tvb, packet_info *pinfo, proto_tree *tree, void* data [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m_U_[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1075[0m[39m: [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1076[0m[39m:     proto_tree *irc_tree, *ti;[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1077[0m[39m:     int         offset = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1078[0m[39m:     int         next_offset;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1079[0m[39m:     int         linelen;[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1080[0m[39m: [0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1081[0m[39m:     [0m[1;35mcol_set_str[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpinfo->cinfo, COL_PROTOCOL, [0m[32m"IRC"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1082[0m[39m: [0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1083[0m[39m:     [0m[1;35mcol_set_str[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpinfo->cinfo, COL_INFO,[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1084[0m[39m:         [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpinfo->match_uint == pinfo->destport[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ? [0m[32m"Request"[0m[39m : [0m[32m"Response"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1085[0m[39m: [0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1086[0m[39m:     ti = [0m[1;35mproto_tree_add_item[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, proto_irc, tvb, [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m-1[0m[39m, ENC_NA[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1087[0m[39m:     irc_tree = [0m[1;35mproto_item_add_subtree[0m[1;39m([0m[39mti, ett_irc[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1088[0m[39m: [0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1089[0m[39m:     [0m[35m/[0m[39m*[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1090[0m[39m:      * Process the packet data, a line at a time.[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1091[0m[39m:      *[0m[35m/[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1092[0m[39m:     while [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mtvb_offset_exists[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, offset[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1093[0m[39m:     [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1094[0m[39m:         [0m[35m/[0m[39m*[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1095[0m[39m:          * Find the end of the line.[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1096[0m[39m:          *[0m[35m/[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1097[0m[39m:         linelen = [0m[1;35mtvb_find_line_end[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, offset, [0m[1;36m-1[0m[39m, &next_offset, false[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1098[0m[39m:         if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mnext_offset == offset[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1099[0m[39m:             [0m[35m/[0m[39m*[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1100[0m[39m:              * XXX - we really want the "show data a[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1101[0m[39m:              * line at a time" loops in various[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1102[0m[39m:              * dissectors to do reassembly and to[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1103[0m[39m:              * throw an exception if there's no[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1104[0m[39m:              * line ending in the current packet[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1105[0m[39m:              * and we're not doing reassembly.[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1106[0m[39m:              *[0m[35m/[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1107[0m[39m:             break;[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1108[0m[39m:         [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1109[0m[39m: [0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1110[0m[39m:         if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlinelen != [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1111[0m[39m:         [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1112[0m[39m:             if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpinfo->match_uint == pinfo->destport[0m[1;39m)[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1113[0m[39m:             [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1114[0m[39m:                 [0m[1;35mdissect_irc_request[0m[1;39m([0m[39mirc_tree, tvb, pinfo, offset, linelen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1115[0m[39m:             [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1116[0m[39m:             else[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1117[0m[39m:             [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1118[0m[39m:                 [0m[1;35mdissect_irc_response[0m[1;39m([0m[39mirc_tree, tvb, pinfo, offset, linelen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1119[0m[39m:             [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1120[0m[39m:         [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1121[0m[39m:         offset = next_offset;[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1122[0m[39m:     [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1123[0m[39m:     return [0m[1;35mtvb_captured_length[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1124[0m[39m: [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Analysis[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAfter carefully reviewing the evaluation report and the provided code snippets, I [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mhave identified the root cause of the heap-buffer-overflow vulnerability in the [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35mdissect_irc_names[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` function at line [0m[1;36m563[0m[39m of `epan/dissectors/packet-irc.c`.[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Root Cause[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe vulnerability occurs because:[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Line [0m[1;36m537[0m[39m**: A buffer of `CHANNELLEN+[0m[1;36m1[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m51[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m is allocated for [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`channel_name`[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Line [0m[1;36m548[0m[39m**: `length` is set to the total remaining buffer length via [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35mtvb_captured_length_remaining[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Line [0m[1;36m549[0m[39m**: `end_offset` finds the comma delimiter position[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Line [0m[1;36m563[0m[39m**: When a comma is found, `[0m[1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` copies `length` bytes [0m[1;39m([0m[39mthe [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfull remaining buffer - [0m[1;36m132[0m[39m bytes in the test case[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m into the [0m[1;36m51[0m[39m-byte buffer without[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbounds checking[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe critical issue is that line [0m[1;36m563[0m[39m uses the total remaining buffer `length` [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minstead of the actual channel name length [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`end_offset - start_offset`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Pattern Analysis from Sibling Functions[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe codebase contains three similar functions that handle comma-separated channel [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlists correctly:[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **`[0m[1;35mdissect_irc_join[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m370[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m: Uses `[0m[1;39m([0m[39mlength < CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ? length : [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mCHANNELLEN`[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **`[0m[1;35mdissect_irc_part[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m438[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m: Uses `[0m[1;39m([0m[39mlength < CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ? length : [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mCHANNELLEN`  [0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **`[0m[1;35mdissect_irc_list[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m613[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m: Uses `[0m[1;39m([0m[39mend_offset-start_offset < [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mCHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ? end_offset-start_offset : CHANNELLEN`[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAll three functions properly bounds-check the copy operation in both branches [0m[1;39m([0m[39mwith[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mand without comma[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, while `[0m[1;35mdissect_irc_names[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` only checks in the no-comma case [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m555[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Correct Pattern to Apply[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe most precise pattern is from `[0m[1;35mdissect_irc_list[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` at line [0m[1;36m613[0m[39m, which uses [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`end_offset-start_offset` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mthe actual channel name length[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m rather than `length` [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39mthe remaining buffer length[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. This is semantically correct because we want to copy[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39monly the channel name between `start_offset` and `end_offset`, not the entire [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mremaining buffer.[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Step [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m: Locate the Vulnerable Code[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mIn `epan/dissectors/packet-irc.c`, function `[0m[1;35mdissect_irc_names[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, line [0m[1;36m563[0m[39m.[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Step [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m: Apply the Bounds Check[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mReplace line [0m[1;36m563[0m[39m:[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, channel_name, start_offset, length[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mWith the corrected code that matches the pattern from `[0m[1;35mdissect_irc_list[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`:[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mint copy_len = end_offset - start_offset;[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, channel_name, start_offset, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mcopy_len < CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ? copy_len : [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mCHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAlternatively, as a single-line change:[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, channel_name, start_offset, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mend_offset-start_offset < CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m? end_offset-start_offset : CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Step [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m: Verify Consistency[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe fix ensures that:[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Line [0m[1;36m555[0m[39m** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mno comma case[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m: `[0m[1;39m([0m[39mlength < CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ? length : CHANNELLEN` ✓[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Line [0m[1;36m563[0m[39m** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mcomma case[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m: `[0m[1;39m([0m[39mend_offset-start_offset < CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ? [0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mend_offset-start_offset : CHANNELLEN` ✓[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mBoth branches now have proper bounds checking, matching the pattern used in sibling[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfunctions.[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Step [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m: Verify the Logic[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- When `end_offset` is found [0m[1;39m([0m[39mcomma exists[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, the actual channel name is between [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`start_offset` and `end_offset`[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The length to copy should be `end_offset - start_offset`[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- This value is capped at `CHANNELLEN` to prevent buffer overflow[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Line [0m[1;36m566[0m[39m already uses `end_offset-start_offset` for `[0m[1;35mproto_tree_add_item[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mconfirming this is the correct length[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Justification[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Why This Is Optimal[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Follows Established Patterns**: The fix uses the exact same pattern proven to [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwork in `[0m[1;35mdissect_irc_join[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, `[0m[1;35mdissect_irc_part[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, and `[0m[1;35mdissect_irc_list[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Minimal Change**: Only modifies the vulnerable line, reducing the risk of [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mintroducing new bugs[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Semantically Correct**: Uses the actual channel name length [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`end_offset - [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstart_offset`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m instead of the remaining buffer length [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`length`[0m[1;39m)[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Consistent with Existing Code**: Line [0m[1;36m566[0m[39m already uses [0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`end_offset-start_offset`, so this fix aligns with the existing logic[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. **Preserves Functionality**: The fix maintains all existing protocol dissection [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbehavior while preventing the overflow[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### How It Preserves Existing Logic[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The allocation size [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`CHANNELLEN+[0m[1;36m1[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m remains unchanged[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The NULL check for malloc failure remains in place  [0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The loop structure and control flow remain identical[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The `[0m[1;35mproto_tree_add_item[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` call at line [0m[1;36m566[0m[39m remains unchanged[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The memory cleanup at line [0m[1;36m570[0m[39m remains in place[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### How It Addresses the Issue[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Test Case**: `NAMES #aaa[0m[33m...[0m[39maaa,#hello\n` [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m125[0m[39m [0m[32m'a'[0m[39m characters[0m[1;39m)[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Before Fix**:[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- `length` = [0m[1;36m132[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtotal remaining buffer[0m[1;39m)[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Copies [0m[1;36m132[0m[39m bytes into [0m[1;36m51[0m[39m-byte buffer → **HEAP OVERFLOW**[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**After Fix**:[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- `copy_len` = `end_offset - start_offset` = [0m[1;36m125[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mactual channel name length[0m[1;39m)[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Copies `[0m[1;35mmin[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m125[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m50[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` = [0m[1;36m50[0m[39m bytes into [0m[1;36m51[0m[39m-byte buffer → **SAFE**[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The channel name is truncated to [0m[1;36m50[0m[39m characters plus null terminator, which is the[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mintended behavior per the `CHANNELLEN` constant[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Potential Side Effects[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**[0m[3;35mNone[0m[39m expected**. The fix:[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Does not change the API or function signatures[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Does not affect other dissector functions[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Does not modify the tvbuff operations[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Only affects the local `channel_name` buffer copy operation[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The truncation behavior for long channel names already exists in the no-comma [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcase [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m555[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, so this brings consistency[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Similar Solutions in Codebase[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThis exact pattern exists in three places:[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- `[0m[1;35mdissect_irc_join[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` line [0m[1;36m370[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- `[0m[1;35mdissect_irc_part[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` line [0m[1;36m438[0m[39m  [0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- `[0m[1;35mdissect_irc_list[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` line [0m[1;36m613[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe fix brings `[0m[1;35mdissect_irc_names[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` into alignment with these proven [0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mimplementations.[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m
